Background andmethods : Anthroposophi ctreatmentforanxiety

panicdisorder(39 %).Mediandiseasedurationwas4.5years. 
Theanthroposophictreatmentmodalitiesusedweremedica-

(30 %),andrhythmicalmassagetherapy(3 %).Mediannum ber 
ofeurythmy/ art/massagesessio nswas12,mediantherapy
durationwas120days.
Frombaselinetosix-monthfollow-up,alloutcomesimprove d

CES-D8.79(5.61 –11.98,p<0.001),andSF-36Ment alComponen t 
9.53(5.98 –13.08,p<0.001).Allimprove mentsweremaintained 
untillastfollow-upafter24months.

andqualityoflife.
